reviews.review: Even though you'll finish it in an afternoon, you'll remember it for the rest of your life.
A Classic
If you've somehow not had the opportunity to play Portal yet... I envy you. An absolute must play.

Épico. Necesito más y más puzzles, y aún así me parecerían pocos.

PD.: ¿Dónde está mi tarta?
its fun

人呐就都不知道，自己也不可以预料，一个人的命运啊，当然要靠自我奋斗，但是也要考虑历史的进程。我绝对不知道，我作为一个MOBA游戏玩家怎么把我来评论Portal去了。
所以G胖同志同我讲话了，说：’’V社已经决定了，你来写评论。“我说另请高明吧，我实在也不是谦虚。我一个MOBA游戏玩家怎么到Portal来了呢？但是，G胖同志讲：’’大家已经研究决定了”。后来我念了两句诗，叫：’苟利神枪生死以，岂因烧脑避趋之“。
所以我觉得这款游戏中规中矩，但是却是一款非常好玩的一款FPS游戏（也可以说是养成类游戏？萌萌Glados爱上我？），以前看电视上有人玩过，片尾音乐好听。缺点么，就是不耐玩，两个小时就通关了……
Why are you reading my review? Play the game already!!!

Melhor curva de aprendizado já feita.

Melhor I.A. sarcástica e psicopata já feita.

Melhor jogo pra fazer você se sentir inteligente, mesmo sendo uma besta.

10/10
De los mejores juegos que hay, sin duda alguna te pone a pensar. Valio la pena comprarlo en las rebajas, ahora a jugar el 2

Excellent and riveting story, relevant gameplay, aged well, well though out, replayability, etc. Truly an excellent game.

10/10punkten
MUY r3comendado
Jeu surprenant, original et fun à jouer ! Vraiment une bonne surprise !
Do I really need a reason?

This was a triumph!
I'm making a note here:
Huge success!

It's hard to overstate
my satisfaction.

Aperture Science:
We do what we must
because we can
For the good of all of us.
Except the ones who are dead.

But there's no sense crying
over every mistake.
You just keep on trying
'til you run out of cake.
And the science gets done.
And you make a neat gun
for the people who are
still alive.

I'm not even angry...
I'm being so sincere right now.
Even though you broke my heart,
and killed me.

And tore me to pieces.
And threw every piece into a fire.
As they burned it hurt because
I was so happy for you!

Now, these points of data
make a beautiful line.
And we're out of beta.
We're releasing on time!
So I'm GLaD I got burned!
Think of all the things we learned!
for the people who are
still alive.

Go ahead and leave me...
I think I'd prefer to stay inside...
Maybe you'll find someone else
to help you.
Maybe Black Mesa?
That was a joke. Ha Ha. Fat Chance!

Anyway this cake is great!
It's so delicious and moist!

Look at me: still talking
when there's science to do!
When I look out there,
it makes me GlaD I'm not you.

I've experiments to run.
There is research to be done.
On the people who are
still alive.
And believe me I am
still alive.
I'm doing science and I'm
still alive.
I feel fantastic and I'm
still alive.
While you're dying I'll be
still alive.
And when you're dead I will be
still alive

Still alive.

Still alive.

10/10
I lovwe this game, the story line, and everything about it, well done valve!
amazing

Nominato per il premio "WOW, che storia!"

Portal doesn't need anyone else singing it's praises, but what the heck. An innovative platformer with excellent level design, a brilliant core mechanic and some delightfully sarcastic narration. One of the only games I can't think of anything bad to say about. If you haven't played this one, do yourself a favour and give it a try. You'll thank me.

The surprise hit from The Orange Box, and a game series I occasionally go back to for both enjoyable gameplay and an engaging world built from the ground up.  One of several game series that I'm hoping Valve will eventually add a '3' to.
Awesome
It's the portaliest
Great puzzles and great atmosphere. A little short but worth it.
Por más que pasa el tiempo este juego sigue siendo muy entretenido

Short and enjoyable puzzle game.

The main game is pretty easy to solve and short.
The story is kinda creative and there were some lols.

The advanced maps/puzzles were really hard imo, but i mastered all of them after some cups of coffee :)

solid 5/7, the cake was delicious
Portal is still one of my favorite games ever. I've played it a stupid number of times and will continue to re-play it many more I'm sure. Some day there will be cake.
Excellent puzzle game that passed the test of time. Challenging but not frustrating. Good story also.  Great to introduce a non gamer to the wonderful world of Steam and PC gaming!
i like the creativity of this game

If you consider youself a fan of games but have never played Portal, you should be ashamed of yourself.
I had no idea what I was missing until I picked it up for a few bucks during the summer sale.
It left me in awe.

This game is a classic, and a must have for anyone who calls themselves a a pc gamer!

The best way to describe this game is short but sweet. The story can be completed in about 2-3 hours, but those few hours provide an incredibly fun time. It really makes you think about every level, sometimes testing your mettle in a panic. Besides, this game is incredibly cheap, and full of stuff often referenced in internet culture. Give this game a go! You will like it a lot.

テストプレイヤーという主人公の立場と

先に進むごとにぐんぐん物語に引き込まれていきます。

Не знаю, что ещё написать, поэтому вот вам рецепт шарлотки:

1. 4 яйца взбить со стаканом сахара до стойкой пены
2. всыпать стакан муки и размешать до однородности
3. яблоки очистить и нарезать ломтиками, выложить в смазанную маслом форму
4. залить тестом
5. запекать 40 минут в духовке при 180 градусов

Приятного аппетита!

Portal is a short but fantastic game. The voice acting (of which theres a lot) is great. The puzzles are well crafted and not at all repetitive and the feeling this game gives you when you find rattmans rooms will haunt you in your sleep.

A really cool puzzle game, 10/10 would play again. Short but very fun and doesn't even cost that much. The SCIENCE of this game is pretty neat, too.

Hace poco lo volví a rejugar ya que se lo regale a una persona y como no, le ENCANTO. Por el precio que está, es un must have.

晃眼一看还以为自己在玩CS，虽然通关花样比较单一，但还是很有趣，卡关卡久了会烦躁，传送次数多了会晕，大概是仅有的缺点吧
it's definitely a musthave
最近刚刚通关1和2，由于先玩的2，对各种技巧有了一定的了解，所以只花了大概2个多小时就通关了。难度个人感觉比2要简单些（2代部分章节各种找路，简直丧心病狂）。缺点嘛，就是与2比起来，剧情较为薄弱。如果不是之前玩过2，可能到最后都是一脸蒙蔽无脑解谜的。总之，值得购买（黑五打折两代一共才15，还要啥自行车）。

최근에 한 게임 중에서 제일 재미있게 함. 하프라이프보다 재밌게 한듯. 기발한 아이디어들과 적당한 긴장감이 좋았고 중후반에 공포게임같은 느낌이 났던 점이 참 인상적.

무었보다도 VR로 만들면 진짜 대박일듯. 번지점프하는 느낌도 나고.
一款非常独特的游戏，将fps和解密巧妙的结合，很有创意
创造性的关卡设计，非常有趣，益智类游戏，我喜欢。
Un juego que marco un hito en la historia de los videojuegos. Y hoy día aguanta como un juego actual, no tengo mucho que decir. Compradlo. ^^
really good game
